education.description: I am studying artificial intelligence in Institute for Interdisciplinary Information Sciences. I have received Comprehensive Excellence Award (2019-2020) and Comprehensive Excellence Award (2020-2021).
I have received Principal Scholarship, Grand Prize and Gold Prize (Computer) in S.-T. Yau High School Science Award, and National First Prize of Awarding Program for Future Scientists.
